dmxeffects.dmx
Class Generator

java.lang.Object
  dmxeffects.dmx.Generator

public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object

Class to generate DMX values for test purposes.

Author:
chris

generate

public void generate(int channelNumber)
              throws InvalidChannelNumberException
Method to generate a single random value upon a specified channel number, leaving the other values unchanged.

Throws:
InvalidChannelNumberException - Exception thrown indicating the channelNumber does not follow the specification.
OperationFailedException - Getting user input failed.
OperationCancelledException - User cancelled input gathering.

inject

public void inject(int channelNumber,
                   int channelValue)
            throws InvalidChannelNumberException,
                   InvalidChannelValueException
Method to insert a specific value upon a specified channel number, leaving the other values unchanged.

Parameters:
channelNumber - The number of the channel to insert the data upon. This should be between 1 and 512 inclusive.
channelValue - The value to insert onto the specified channel. This should be between 0 and 255 inclusive.
Throws:
InvalidChannelNumberException - Exception thrown indicating the channelNumber does not follow the specification.
InvalidChannelValueException - Exception thrown indicating the channelValue does not follow the specification.

generateValue

public int generateValue()
Method to generate a single channel value. This should be from 0 to 255 inclusive.

Returns:
The value generated.
